data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of the northeast monsoon, the weather over southern China will be persistently fine and very dry tomorrow. It will still be cold over inland areas in the morning. A strong easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong later tomorrow to Monday. A dry northeast monsoon is expected to bring mainly fine weather to the coastal areas in the middle and latter parts of next week. It will be mild during the day over the region. Besides, an area of low pressure is expected to bring unsettled weather to the seas east of the Philippines in the middle and latter parts of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260111","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 4, east force 5 later, occasionally force 6 offshore.","forecastWeather":"Fine. Rather cool in the morning.
